document.title: Technical Bulletins: Revenue Sharing "Rule" on Bank Employment Policies Held Voluntary
document.abstract: In challenging a regulation created by the federal Office of Revenue Sharing, the North Carolina League of Municipalities discovered how federal agencies, in their attempts to promote broad policies, overstep their legal authority.

field.name: comments
field.value:
(Reprinted from October 1978 NLC League Letter for State Municipal Leagues)
